slots.log(message, mode): Displays the message to the user, mode can be "info", "error", "console", "debug" or "output".
slots.revertConfig: Reverts config to the state it was in before executing this script.
slots.usedEnv: Environment currently in use, not necessarily same as [[Eerie activeEnv]].
slots.root: Value of EERIEDIR system's environment variable.
slots.activeEnv: Default environment. You probably need [[Eerie usedEnv]].
slots.sh(cmd[, logFailure=true, dir=cwd]): Executes system command. If logFailure is true and command exists with non-zero value application will abort.

Eerie.author: Josip Lisec
Eerie.description: Eerie is the package manager for Io.
